ch2-space © tic-tac-toe egg game by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2024 9 assembly of the pouch and making loopholes round 1 rose lay the panels on top of each other with the right sides facing out hold the front panel facing up work through both loops of the stitches on both panels work in the direction indicated of the arrows in the 2nd photo above at the end of this round your work should look as in the 3rd photo above attach yarn with a slip_stitch in the top left chain-space chain 1 single_crochet in the same space 31 crab stitch 2 crab stitch in the next ch2-space x 3 omit the last crab stitch of the last repeat do not cut yarn 99 single_crochet round 2 rose continue to crochet in each panel separately first in the back panel and then in the front panel chain 3 this counts as 1 half_double_crochet and 1 chain half_double_crochet in the next st chain 1 skip 1 st x 33 slip_stitch into the space formed by the starting ch3 as shown in the 3rd photo below 34 half_double_crochet 34 ch1-space round 3 rose single_crochet in the same ch1-space chain 2 the single_crochet and ch2 count as double_crochet chain 1 skip the next st double_crochet in the next ch1-space x 33 chain 1 slip_stitch in the starting ch2-space 34 double_crochet 34 ch1-space © tic-tac-toe egg game by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2024 10 round 4 rose chain 1 this counts as a single_crochet skip the next st 2 single_crochet in the next chain-space picot skip the next st 2 single_crochet in the next chain-space x 17 omit the last single_crochet of the last repeat fasten_off close the round with an invisible join over the starting chain 17 picot 34 single_crochet the cord with 2 eggs crochet rounds 1-11 of the pattern for the eggs in color rose make 2 chain a length of cord in color dusty light
